import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=_ref=>{let{setIsLoggedIn}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[showPassword,setShowPassword]=useState(false);const[stayLoggedIn,setStayLoggedIn]=useState(false);const[errorMessage,setErrorMessage]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('https://cododojo-backend.onrender.com/login',{username,password});const token=response.data.access_token;// Save token based on "Stay Logged In" checkbox state
if(stayLoggedIn){localStorage.setItem('token',token);}else{sessionStorage.setItem('token',token);}setErrorMessage('');setIsLoggedIn(true);}catch(err){setErrorMessage('Invalid credentials!');}};const togglePasswordVisibility=()=>{setShowPassword(!showPassword);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"username",children:"Username:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{position:'relative'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:showPassword?'text':'password',id:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true,style:{paddingRight:'50px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:togglePasswordVisibility,className:"show-password",children:showPassword?'Hide':'Show'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checkbox-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",id:"stayLoggedIn",checked:stayLoggedIn,onChange:e=>setStayLoggedIn(e.target.checked)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"stayLoggedIn",children:"Stay Logged In"})]}),errorMessage&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-message",children:errorMessage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Don't have an account?",' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/register",className:"switch-link",children:"Register"})]})]});};export default Login;
